titles: A sermon preached at the funerall of Mr. Iosiah Reynel Esquire, the 13. of August 1614. in East-Ogwell in Deuon. By Iohn Preston Minister of Gods word in East-Ogwell
author: Preston, John, minister of East Ogwell.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Richard Boulton, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery-lane,
notes: Running title reads: A funerall sermon.
Identified as STC 20267 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
